short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Udemy Remaining Time Calculator: Optimize Udemy learning with real-time progress updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
• See time left for entire course.
• Track section progress effortlessly.
• Works with any Udemy business account


Hey everyone! 🌟 Exciting news! 🚀 We've got an awesome extension to share with you - it's all about keeping track of your Udemy course time! 🕒✨ But guess what? It's not just an extension, it's a cool, open-source project that's ready to grow with YOUR help! 🌱💻

Join us on this amazing journey by contributing to the project on GitHub: https://github.com/edenizk/udemyRemainingTimerExtention🤝🌐 Your coding skills are super welcome, but don't worry if coding isn't your thing! 🙌💡 Drop your fantastic ideas here: https://github.com/edenizk/udemyRemainingTimerExtention/issues/new 🚀🌈 Let's make this extension even more awesome together! 🚀🎉 #OpenSourceMagic ✨🌟

Features:
Real-Time Section Progress:
Keep tabs on your course advancement with the ability to see the exact time remaining for the current section. Stay in control and make informed decisions on your study strategy.

Holistic Course Countdown:
Plan your learning journey effectively by accessing the total time left for the entire course. Gain a comprehensive overview and manage your schedule efficiently to meet your academic goals.

Visual and Text generated by AI 🙂

Disclaimer:
This extension is not developed or endorsed by Udemy. It is an open-source tool created independently. This extension is not affiliated with, supported by, or connected to Udemy in any way. Be aware that any issues or concerns related to its functionality are the sole responsibility of the extension's developers.

If you have any questions, concerns, or if you wish to request the removal of this extension, please contact us via email at edenizk.work.sub@gmail.com. We will promptly address your inquiry and take appropriate action.
